Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the film *Housefull 2*?
Options:
A. a) Sandeep Shirodkar composed the film score for Housefull 2.
B. b) Housefull 2 is a Bollywood film released in 2012.
C. c) The soundtrack for Housefull 2 is referred to as Housefull 2 Soundtrack.
D. d) Sandeep Shirodkar directed Housefull 2.
Answer: a) Sandeep Shirodkar composed the film score for Housefull 2., b) Housefull 2 is a Bollywood film released in 2012., c) The soundtrack for Housefull 2 is referred to as Housefull 2 Soundtrack.
